brief_summary.textblock: The study will involve parents filling out a survey before & after watching a teaching tool video (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rIH63jqvlio) in addition to standard post-op teaching. The parents randomized to the video arms will watch the video while their child is in the OR and then either take the post survey immediately after or wait to take the survey until just prior to discharge. Parents not in the video arms of the study will also be asked to complete a survey pre and post standard pain management teaching.

primary_outcome.measure: Difference in answers to pre & post teaching questionnaires
primary_outcome.description: Assessing the difference in how parents answered the questionnaire before receiving any discharge instructions and the questionnaire after watching the video or receiving standard discharge instructions by the nurse.

secondary_outcome.description: Assessing if patient is comfortable at home.
Assessing if parent felt comfortable taking patient home.

arm_group.description: Parents will receive standard discharge teaching from the nurse prior to discharge.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Video w/ post exam immediately after video
arm_group.description: Parents will watch the video and then take the post test immediately after watching the video.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Video w/ post exam after discharge teaching
arm_group.description: Parents will watch the video but wait to take the post exam until after the discharge instructions are given by the nurse prior to discharge.

intervention.description: Watching a YouTube video containing post tonsillectomy discharge instructions.
intervention.arm_group_label: Video w/ post exam immediately after video
Video w/ post exam after discharge teaching

intervention.description: Receiving standard post tonsillectomy discharge instructions from the nurse prior to discharge.
intervention.arm_group_label: Video w/ post exam after discharge teaching

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Parent or caregiver of any child having either adenotonsillectomy or tonsillectomy.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Non-english speaking families that require an interpreter.
- Any parent/family/caregiver that declines to be part of the study.
